items.sentence: I got a present, but I don't know who it's from.
I looked everywhere, except for the right place.
I fell asleep as soon as my head hit the pillow.
It's not always easy to combine school and work.
Which sound is the hardest for you to pronounce?
That's the Indonesian flag, not the Polish flag.
Tom wrote to Mary to tell her that he loved her.
Tom never wore the shirt that Mary made for him.
Tom didn't think that Mary was ready to do that.
Would you be willing to work in another country?
